hero_subtitle: Millat Umidi is one of the biggest educational holdings in Uzbekistan. Our projects: Millat Umidi University, Millat Umidi School, Khan Academy, Edu Action Study Abroad, IDP IELTS (Exams.uz), Result LC
stats_subtitle: Work with Millat Umidi and get the best experience in the job market.

founder.name: Umidjon Ishmukhamedov
founder.title: Founder of Millat Umidi Group
founder.quote1: At Millat Umidi, we believe that education is the foundation of a prosperous society. Our journey began with a simple vision: to create world-class educational institutions that nurture young minds and prepare them for tomorrow's challenges.
founder.quote2: We are not just building schools and universities; we are building dreams, shaping futures, and creating opportunities for the next generation. Every member of our team plays a crucial role in this transformative mission.
founder.quote3: Join us in making a lasting impact on education in Uzbekistan and beyond. Together, we can build a brighter future for our nation's youth.

features.title: Why Choose Millat Umidi?
features.subtitle: Work with us and get the best experience in the job market
features.career_growth_desc: Shape the future of education in Uzbekistan with real impact.
features.innovation_desc: We value initiative, fast learning, and give room to grow.
features.work_life_balance_desc: Work directly, move fast, and see results.
features.competitive_benefits_desc: We use AI and automation to make your work more focused and efficient.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.

footer.description: Millat Umidi Group - Leading educational holding in Uzbekistan
